text: ENTERTAINMENTPerfect North Slopes is a winter wonderland rain, snow or shine Carter SkaggsBen Donaldson, 38, originally of Cincinnati, shreds down the black diamond Center Stage slope on his snowboard on Saturday, Dec. 30, 2023, at Perfect North Slopes in Lawrenceburg, Ind.Carter Skaggs/The EnquirerJacob Clark, 12, of Lexington, Ky., makes his way towards Perfect North Slopesâ€™ new quad chair lift on Saturday, Dec. 30, 2023, at Perfect North Slopes in Lawrenceburg, Ind. Earlier this year, the red three-person chair lift was upgraded to a four-person lift.Carter Skaggs/The EnquirerSnow tubers barrel down the tubing slopes on Saturday, Dec. 30, 2023, at Perfect North Slopes in Lawrenceburg, Ind.
